# setNeedsUpdateConfiguration()

**Instance Method**

Requests the system update the button configuration.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func setNeedsUpdateConfiguration()
```

## Discussion

Call this method to make the system call [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIButton/updateConfiguration()]. The system calls this method automatically when the button’s state changes. If you call this method multiple times before the system calls [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIButton/updateConfiguration()], the system calls [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIButton/updateConfiguration()] once.

## Managing the appearance with a configuration object

- **configuration**: The configuration for the button’s appearance.
- **automaticallyUpdatesConfiguration**: A Boolean value that determines whether the button configuration changes when button’s state changes.
- **updateConfiguration()**: Updates the button configuration in response to a button state change.
- **configurationUpdateHandler**: A closure that executes when the button state changes.
- **UIButton.ConfigurationUpdateHandler**: A closure to update the configuration of a button.
